result.name: nextbuses-api
result.notes:
The NextBuses API allows users to access live departure information by stop for public transport across Great Britain. Real time information will be provided where it is available and scheduled departures where not.

The API is based on SIRI, an XML based standard.
result.title: NextBuses API
